wordGroup: in the midst of 在…之中
into the midst of 在…当中，入…之中
from the midst of 出自…之中，从…当中

sentences.en: There is a traitor in our midst.
She stood preening in their midst, delighted with the attention.
sentences.cn: 她得意洋洋地站在他们中间，为受人瞩目而高兴。

sentences.en: Many were surprised to see him exposed like this in the midst of a large crowd.
sentences.cn: 很多人看到他这样暴露在一大群人当中，都感到很意外。
